website_summaries.verdict: Spectacles are fun to use, but the improvements aren’t enough to make Snapchatters pay more for version two.
pros: Recording and transferring clips is easy and quick, plus you can export non-circular video
The glasses don’t look as outlandish as the first version
cons: Recording clips longer than 10 seconds means you have to keep pressing the button, which is annoying, and the glasses still work only with Snapchat

customer_reviews.title: A millennial niche item (if you've got the cash)
customer_reviews.text: If youre an avid snapchat user such as myself (stewy4198 add me) than these will be the perfect gift for you. Push a button to take a vid, push and hold for a pic and everything is stored to the glasses until you transfer to your snapchat. (Do it over Wifi so everything is HD) My few gripes are that the battery life is frankly terrible and they are way too pricey. The camera quality appears 720p which in 2018 is nothing to brag about and the charging cables magnets are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Stewy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for quick picture/video!
customer_reviews.text: Takes decent short videos. The video I posted does have a filter on it. I can't wait to use them on vacation! Value for the money. I do think they're abit overpriced. You have to use snapchat to upload everything. For $200 you should be able to upload to your gallery too but they are produced by snapchat sooo As for battery life, I can take about 10 videos and it's ready to charge up again. But with that being said, you can just take pictures and it uses less battery. Water resistant? I mean I've worn them on my head while it's sprinkling outside with no issues but it hasn't been summer yet so no direct swimming pools.
customer_reviews.author: Kcole

customer_reviews.title: Pairing Issues
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have pretty bad pairing issues, it is always hit or miss on whether it will successfully connect to my phone. I have been able to pair the glasses on a few occasions, it seems like if you "forget" the spectacles in settings and start over, there's a chance that they will connect but doesn't always work. The amount of work you have to put into successfully pairing/connecting the glasses to your phone is ridiculous and not worth the price tag. For $200 I shouldn't have to be troubleshooting these things every time I want to upload a video.
customer_reviews.author: jarellano060790

customer_reviews.title: Not quite there yet!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife since she loves Snapchat and they seem to work but seem to have connection issues a lot and the system doesn’t quite make sense. You can only post the video as part of your story which seems to limit what you can do. It would be so much better if they just went to your device and let you choose how you wanted to post it, that way it could be between all apps or messages or whatever. I love the case and the fact that it charges your glasses and they look cool and feel fine when you’re wearing them but Needs a little work in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher723

customer_reviews.title: Keeps getting better
customer_reviews.text: I've had the V1 for the past couple of years and it still works great - figured I didn't need the V2 until the saw the Nico style which is a more polished / serious look that I've been wanting from them. The V2's seem to take higher quality images and the sound is also clearer vs. the V1's. Snapchat is a different experience when you use these - I've taken some great snaps of hikes and activities such as tennis and running which really allows your friends/fans to experience the 'thru your eyes' lol. If you love Snapchat or want to give the perfect gift for someone who does - this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Kha Le

customer_reviews.title: Definitive Spectacles
customer_reviews.text: Snap Spectacles might be a niche market, but if you're in that market, the 2nd gen Nico Spectacles are the way to go. I'm a bit disappointed there's no charging case for them, but they make up for that in style and use. Out of all three generations, these are the best in terms of value and function. I would only recommend the first gen if you can get them cheap, and I would not recommend the third gen because they are almost $400. Go for the Nico!
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: excellent sunglasses with great capture feature but longevity issues burn
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sunglasses so much that I bought a second pair after the first pair would no longer charge after 14 months. 4 months out of the 1 year warranty with no possibility of repair. Support was very helpful but in the end I had just has another pair of sunglasses. Picture quality and short video duration work for me. I just want really good sunglasses that can capture pics / video from time to time in any environment. I used these daily under normal usage scenarios. I hate that they died and can't be repaired, that's the 3 star overall. Otherwise very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have never been one to drop money on sunglasses. I thought the original style for the first version was ugly. The Nico style is just what was needed. I have not tested it in any water yet. Make sure you read the manual when you get the glasses because there is a process for drying them off when wet. The video quality is not as good as my phones camera but it is good enough to capture the moment. In all, I am happy with my purchase. The only thing I do not like about them is that they are only sun glasses. You cannot really wear them inside without being "that guy". I wish the lenses were photochromic.
customer_reviews.author: Christian4423

customer_reviews.title: Spectacles 2,  The great
customer_reviews.text: I've had the V2 , from your store, It is works great , and Nico style which is a more polished , serious looks, The V2's seem to take higher quality images and the sound is also clearer vs. the V1's. Snapchat is a different experience when you use these - I've taken some great snaps of my sports and activities such as running and cyclist ride which really allows your friends/fans to experience the 'thru your eyes, lol. Thanks a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife as a gift and she loves them. She shows them off to all her friends. The video quality looks great and they sync seemlessly to the phone. We have a lot more videos of our dog now...
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Vodovoz

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these the other day, and so far I love them! They take awesome pictures, video is a little choppy but I believe that's my phone not being super great. Little heavy compared to regular sunglasses, so just a little hard to get used to. Will keep this updated...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great video quality
customer_reviews.text: While the quality of the videos and photos it good, I wish you could video longer than 30 seconds and the frames are really big which makes it hard to wear a hat or sun hat with them while traveling. Love the ease of seeing the battery remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Candice's Journeys

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: They only worked for 5 Months. And I didn’t use them after what so ever. To download your snaps or upload them to your feed is almost impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Netcy

customer_reviews.title: My son loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son's birthday present. He was so excited! They have worked perfectly and easy to use! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Better then the 1st Gen
customer_reviews.text: I have the 1st gen and these are such a better upgrade I was going to get the newest one but I like this style still 60fps only thing I wish is that they would stick on my face. I don’t know how to adjust them to fit
customer_reviews.author: Don Pancho Villa

customer_reviews.title: Reset Network Settings if you can’t connect!
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue trying to connect them when I first got them but after a couple minutes I managed to reset my Network Settings on my iPhone and it eventually connected then started importing my snapchats. Overall they’re pretty nice sunglasses with a noticeable camera lol. Snapchats go straight to your memories before posting on your story. Battery not so great. I’ll be sad to see these when the price drops!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the short clips.
customer_reviews.text: I love these for skydiving. But only thing i have a problem with is the short recording. If it was 30 secs that would be great. Could it be upgraded ?
customer_reviews.author: matt ferland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The picture quality is great, better than the iPhone camera. The glasses look great and they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof hd video made easy!?
customer_reviews.text: Water proof like a charm! Battery life is ehh but I don’t care that much bout it. If you have a power bank you’re good to go. Wore them snorkeling in Mexico and got some dope footage! No go pro needed. Just make sure you use a sunglass lanyard !
customer_reviews.author: krys1sdj

customer_reviews.title: Lens cracked randomly
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much, they were great on my trip to Mexico. Although the not camera side cracked when it was in the charging case... don’t know how .. but totally bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Comfort could still be improved but a vast improvement over V1. Waterproofing and video qualify improvements are great. New design is much better than the circle lenses. Still bulkier than necessary hoping v3 are more lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Goth

customer_reviews.title: Hurt!  Heavy on your face!
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy and they don’t fit. Very uncomfortable. They took great pictures and videos. If they didn’t hurt so bad I’d love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy123

customer_reviews.title: Easy access and easy pic and video taking & films underwater!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm jamming a blast because it's easier than Go Pro or smart phone cameras. I wear them as sunglasses (excellent protection) and press button once for video, press & hold for a photo. No fumbling!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer/Read This Book

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing video quality, durable, waterproof, comfortable, great quality charger and case. Excellent battery life. Worth the money! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses! Minus one star because they slide a lot off of my head but the picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: Look great but a little glitchy
customer_reviews.text: The pair I got is glichey. Sometimes it doesn’t record when I hit the button and a red light comes on, also it takes awhile to download. I have an original version and they are more reliable and download faster but they look ridiculous. Overall I like the new ones they look great and if you put a piece of electrical tape over the light no one can tell your recording.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I love my spectacles. Took them on vacation. Great for hikes and underwater recording. Easy to use. So clear how pictures and videos come out. I love them. Great value for what I paid for them and love my color blue. It’s great I don’t have to have my phone to grab a quick pic and hands free so I can enjoy my family time.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Nava

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Video
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are water proof. I use snapchat everyday and love taking videos. The quality is so clear looks like 4k but its really not.
customer_reviews.author: Leonut811

customer_reviews.title: The best kid camera out there
customer_reviews.text: Love this version ... best for taking videos of your kids without them taking the phone or camera away
customer_reviews.author: Anetora

customer_reviews.title: Bad Battery
customer_reviews.text: Bad battery and I rarely use them because of it. I also wish the ring light was covered
customer_reviews.author: Ty C.

customer_reviews.title: never leave home without them!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when these first came out. but that quickly changed when I was out and about at a theme park, and very quickly became tired of removing my phone from my pocket every 2 sec to wanna take a picture. bought these and problem solved !!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I love the feature when you rotate the phone in snapchat. I've swimmed with it and still works underwater. Plus its comfortable. Would buy again. Great present for Snapchat junkies...
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Original has more functionality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't nit like the lack of a battery case, for $200 not worth it but at $150 it would be a better value
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: excellent picture, features you don't find anywhere else in similar products
customer_reviews.text: a lot of fun, mystery why they haven't caught on with more people.
customer_reviews.author: BradDillon

customer_reviews.title: Showtime
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have I've gotten so many compliments on these its ridiculous the pictures and videos it takes are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frame scratches easily but good at what it's made for
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect but the body scratches so easily. Within a day the frame was scratched and I kept it in its case. Weird but overall good product. Wish the recording quality was a little better though
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Images
customer_reviews.text: Impressive product. Loved the quality of the images and the convenience of clicking to get 10,20,30 videos. Interestingly, they fitted perfectly over my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great detail
customer_reviews.text: I wish these wrapped around my eyes a little better to keep the sun out; like Oakley's. It doesn't always connect and upload the snaps I've done. It's too bad when I think I caught something on camera but it never finds the snap.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Spectacles
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I get so many compliments on them and quite honestly they are pretty darn cool! Love wearing them and capturing life as I see it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses I own
customer_reviews.text: i love these sunglasses! everyone else love them also, really like everyone i talk to cant stop starring and talking about them. you should get them!
customer_reviews.author: @supercoachlou

customer_reviews.title: Scratched.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love them. Mine came scratched which I find unacceptable for the price but still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality+++
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! These glasses are way more durable than I had assumed. My Snapchat followers really like the content I upload as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob W

customer_reviews.title: Super cool/stylish!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved his Spectacles!! He was running around like a child showing his friends his new cool glasses! I love that they look stylish as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not HD
customer_reviews.text: They're fun to use, but I wouldn't call them HD cameras. There is a lot of pixelization of the image quality when you upload the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Nitai Dasa

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Camera fogs up after getting splashed with the littlest amount of water. Picture quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Devin Weiskopf

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the glasses. You would think you’ll get the wireless charging case, but you don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Lemuz

customer_reviews.title: ... are little on the small size fits my daughter better video quality is
customer_reviews.text: They are little on the small size fits my daughter better video quality is good
customer_reviews.author: matt darsch

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well. Battery life isn’t so great. Photo quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Say it with me...the price is too got damn high! The glasses were crooked and bulky but the filming was cool and really clear
customer_reviews.author: Mark Radliff

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Records without you knowing it. Battery does not last
customer_reviews.author: Ashley8

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses to enjoy using on special occasions
customer_reviews.text: Not having to always take your phone out to take a video is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These. Are. Amazing. Crazy what technology can do these days. I Love these, my hubby got them for my bday and I've literally used them almost everyday! Great way to keep up with kids too for memories!
customer_reviews.author: Marina W

product_meta.title: Spectacles 2 (Nico) — Water Resistant Polarized Camera Glasses, Made by Snapchat (60fps HD Action Camera)
feature_bullets: HD VIDEO & PHOTO: Meet Spectacles 2 — camera glasses that capture your world, from your perspective. Press the button to take a 10-second video. Press again to keep recording. Hold to take a photo.
WATER RESISTANT: Spectacles 2 (Nico) are built to survive pool parties and snow days, and can even take a photo or video under shallow water!
RECHARGE ON THE GO: Capture and sync up to 70 videos on a single charge. Recharge up to four times in the included Charging Case.
SHARE ANYWHERE: Send your favorite moments on Snapchat, or export and share them anywhere you’d like.
WHAT’S INSIDE: Spectacles 2 (Nico), Protective Case, Charging Cable, Cleaning Cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars216 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
